channel.title: DC32 on The Official DEF CON Networking Team
channel.description: Recent content in DC32 on The Official DEF CON Networking Team

item.title: DEF CON 32 Post-Con
item.description: Another DEF CON is in the books. Overall, it was a bit of a dip. I think the change of things lead to a lot of unknowns, and it shows in the stats: 25% less interwebz bits 15% less registered users on wifi 10% less concurrent users on wifi For full information, see the slides. A couple of incidents to follow up on, but probably the most impactful is to the core.
